Description of incident: Genica dba Geeks.com (Genica)              recently discovered that customer information, including Visa credit              card information, may have been compromised. In particular, it is              possible that an unauthorized person may be in possession of your              names, addresses, telephone numbers, email addresses, credit card              numbers, expiration dates, and card verification numbers. They are              still investigating the details of this incident, but it appears that              an unauthorized individual may have accessed this information by hacking the eCommerce website.
